text: mariyu mikemayindi? Allah peru smarincabadina danini mirenduku tinakudadu? Vastavaniki - gatyantaram leni sankata paristhitulalo tappa - evevi miku (tinataniki) nisedhimpabaddayo, miku visadikarincabadindi kada?Mariyu niscayanga, cala mandi ajnananto (itarulanu) tama istanusaranga margabhrastatvaniki guri cestunnaru. Niscayanga, ni prabhuvu, ayanaku haddulu miri pravartincevari gurinci baga telusu
